attributes.action: Bring more Sex Education lessons into schools.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many doctors are concerned with the lack of Sex education in schools and so are many pupils.  STI's are becoming more and more common each year. HELP teach children how to be careful and to know the right stuff.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
